content:
# The crafting was successful, and I now have one Stone Furnace in my inventory, along with 5 Coal and 1 Iron Gear Wheel.

# Now, I can proceed to place the Stone Furnace for smelting Iron Ore into Iron Plates.

# I will place the Stone Furnace at the desired position.
furnace_position = Position(x=0.0, y=0.0)  # Position where I want to place the Stone Furnace.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the Stone Furnace.

# After placing the furnace, I will insert 5 Iron Ore and 5 Coal into it for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 Iron Ore into the Stone Furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Fuel the furnace with 5 Coal.

# I will now wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 5:  # Check for enough Iron Plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# Finally, I will check the status of the furnace after smelting.
print(f'Final Furnace status: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}')
print(f'Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}')  # Check the final inventory after smelting.
